title: Moderation
content: It is easier than ever to keep your server safe with our highly interactive and customizable moderation tools. Moderation logs, modifiable commands, antil-links, and much more.

title: Welcomes & Goodbyes
content: Give your new members a welcoming message in the server, their DMs or both! Want your members to receive a role upon joining? No problem!

title: Logging
content: Choose what logs, if any, are sent for each action, and where they are sent. Decide how they are sent by customizing the contents of the logs.

title: Todo lists
content: Highly flexible todo lists. Create your own list in the Onixo DMs or a global one in your server. Create, edit, delete and check todos, and customize your todo list how you want.

title: Settings
content: All of our modules and commands have highly customizable settings! Change the functionality and display of our features to your own liking.
